name: OP:Fateful Sailing
description:
Casual Idle Mode, super relaxing play: free your hands, gain rewards even when you’re offline. One tap to claim all resources and heroes grow the easy way.

Straight out of the classic manga: all dreamers welcome to the crew! Super pirate crews are recruiting around the world. Join the best one to begin your adventure on the seas!

Top-tier, unparalleled adventure: when strong fighters clash, it’s all down to strategy. Rack your brain and enjoy the pure fun of combat!

Multiplayer battle, claim champion’s title: race to the top of the rankings, claim the glory of the strongest, and take home the richest rewards!
